biotools.summary: A program for manipulating Affymetrix SNP metadata. SNPsetter will filter the SNPs exported, by chromosome, by allele frequency, or by distance from the last-exported SNP.

bioschemas.name: SNPsetter
bioschemas.summary: A program for manipulating Affymetrix SNP metadata. SNPsetter will filter the SNPs exported, by chromosome, by allele frequency, or by distance from the last-exported SNP.
